Package com.juant.roxxy.handler

Class NeivorHandler

public class NeivorHandler

Handles API routing for Neivor
Author:
Juan Tzun

  • Method Details

    • getAPISubRouter

      public io.vertx.ext.web.Router getAPISubRouter​(io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx)
      Creates configuration for database connection and defines all available routes starting by /api/neivor. The following APIs are available:
      • POST /api/neivor/generate-payment-order (see generatePaymentOrder)
      • GET /api/neivor/payment-order-state/:code (see getPaymentOrderStateByCode)
      Parameters:
      vertx - The entry point into the Vert.x Core API.
      Returns:
      Router with Neivor routes

    • generatePaymentOrder

      public void generatePaymentOrder​(io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext routingContext)
      Payment order generation. The process to be executed is as follows:
      1. Body validation
      2. Resident payable services validation
      3. Resident payable services sum calculation
      4. Payment order code generation
      5. Payment order creation in Neivor database with details. Details associates services with payment order
      Parameters:
      routingContext - Represents the context for the handling of a request in Vert.x-Web.

    • getPaymentOrderStateByCode

      public void getPaymentOrderStateByCode​(io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext routingContext)
      See payment order state by code if exist.
      Parameters:
      routingContext - Represents the context for the handling of a request in Vert.x-Web.

    • getRoutingContextResponseByErrorCode

      public void getRoutingContextResponseByErrorCode​(io.vertx.ext.web.RoutingContext routingContext, java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String codError, java.lang.String message)
      Creates routing context response according to codError parameter. Puts the following headers:
      • content-type: application/json
      • codError: see error codes list below
      • descripcion: error description
      Parameters:
      routingContext - Represents the context for the handling of a request in Vert.x-Web.
      object - Load to be enconded prettily by Json for routing context
      codError - Custom error code for neivor. Can take the following values:
      • 000: PROCESO CONFORME (status code 200)
      • 101: NO HAY SERVICIOS PARA PROCESAR ORDEN DE PAGO (status code 404)
      • 201: message (status code 404)
      • 501: PROBLEMAS CON LA CONEXION + message (status code 404)
      • 502: CARGA UTIL NO VALIDA (status code 400)
      message - Custom extra message for descripcion header
